name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving unauthorized script execution and data exfiltration by taking appropriate mitigation steps.

action--3b36c3c5-0e97-4e2e-b3c7-9e68f2d0.name: Kill malicious process
action--3b36c3c5-0e97-4e2e-b3c7-9e68f2d0.description: Terminate the malicious script that has been executing.

parallel--a4b1bc84-a218-4f32-bc41-fae327.name: Launch Mitigation Steps
parallel--a4b1bc84-a218-4f32-bc41-fae327.description: Simultaneously monitor network activity and isolate compromised hosts.

action--6a64f63f-68bc-4c0c-9985-52f29eed.name: Monitor network traffic for suspicious activity
action--6a64f63f-68bc-4c0c-9985-52f29eed.description: Capture all network traffic to detect any further malicious activity.

action--c2031c67-f154-41ea-a616-3c791f3c.name: Audit user account activity
action--c2031c67-f154-41ea-a616-3c791f3c.description: Check the last 100 login activities to identify unauthorized access.

audit_window.description: Number of last records to audit

action--9b6f0dc1-0b3d-4b40-bbc5-949fc58f.name: Isolate compromised hosts
action--9b6f0dc1-0b3d-4b40-bbc5-949fc58f.description: Block traffic from identified malicious IPs until all compromised hosts are isolated.

until_hosts_isolated--e997c09d-4806-4b29.name: Check if all hosts are isolated
until_hosts_isolated--e997c09d-4806-4b29.description: Repeat isolation process until all monitored hosts are confirmed isolated.
